heading: HB07813
0: AN ACT PROMOTING BREASTFEEDING PRACTICES IN THE PHILIPPINES AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
principal-authors: NIETO, JOHN MARVIN "YUL SERVO" C.; MACEDA, EDWARD VERA PEREZ; MARTINEZ, ERIC M.; SANDOVAL, FEDERICO "RICKY" II S.; MALAPITAN, DALE "ALONG" R.; OLIVAREZ, ERIC L.;
status: Pending with the Committee on HEALTH since 2018-07-30
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07813
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROMOTING BREASTFEEDING PRACTICES IN THE PHILIPPINES AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
ABSTRACT : Declares breastfeeding as basic human rights; Mandates institutions adopting rooming-in and promoting breastfeeding to provide equipment, facilities, and supplies for breast milk collection, storage and utilization; Provides for the education, marketing of breastmilk substitutes, breastmilk supplements and related products.
ALIAS NAME : “Breastfeeding Practices Act”
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : NIETO, JOHN MARVIN "YUL SERVO" C., MACEDA, EDWARD VERA PEREZ, MARTINEZ, ERIC M., SANDOVAL, FEDERICO "RICKY" II S., MALAPITAN, DALE "ALONG" R., OLIVAREZ, ERIC L.
DATE FILED : 2018-05-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
